original_title: Bad Nauheim: Looking for The King
overview: In 1994, a young musician is seeking for his identity - and his father, The King. He refuses to believe that Elvis is dead. The way leads to Bad Nauheim, Germany. Where The King lived from 1958-1960.
tagline: Was Elvis' death a fake? Did he live anonymously in Germany afterwards?
title: Bad Nauheim: Looking for The King
